title: What is the value of the estate
question: What is the value of the estate?
questionHint: You would have been given estate value figures after you submitted the estate report form online.
legend: What is the value of the estate?
grossValue: Gross value of the estate in £
netValue: Net value of the estate in £

required.summary: You haven’t entered the gross amount

invalidCurrencyFormat.summary: You haven’t entered a valid gross amount
invalidCurrencyFormat.message: Enter a valid amount using numbers only

required.summary: You haven’t entered the net amount

invalidCurrencyFormat.summary: You haven’t entered a valid net amount
invalidCurrencyFormat.message: Enter a valid amount using numbers only

netValueGreaterThanGross.summary: The net amount can’t be greater than the gross amount
netValueGreaterThanGross.message: The net amount can’t be greater than the gross amount
